text: Henning Scherf (born 31 October 1938) is a German lawyer and politician (SPD). He was the 6th President of the Senate and Mayor of the Free Hanseatic City of Bremen from 4 July 1995 to 8 November 2005. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Bremen (state) Category:Politicians of the Social Democratic Party of Germany
title: Henning Scherf
